Game: Reader Rabbit- Kindergarten Reader Rabbit Kindergarten is a video game within the edutainment series Reader Rabbit, published by The Learning Company in June 1997. A new version of the game was developed in-house by Graffiti Entertainment, and was released in 2009. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/2693015a-1413-4837-b8b1-a390a37df637.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/3c3ed426-7e27-4b7c-83d5-df90f093ab0d.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/34cfe95f-f826-4c55-96df-7ea3c1e3f771.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/6715cc17-2f81-4f9c-a417-64d98bb4c445.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reader_Rabbit_Kindergarten Adventure; Education The Learning Company The Learning Company
